snippet: Seven members of the National Ballet of Cuba have defected during a Mexican tour and made their way to the United States.
abstract: Seven members of National Ballet of Cuba defect during a Mexican tour and make their way to the United States; say that decision is based on building better future for themselves, both economically and artistically.
lead_paragraph: Seven members of the National Ballet of Cuba have defected during a Mexican tour and made their way to the United States.

headline.seo: Citing Art and Money, 7 Cuban Dancers Defect to U.S.
headline.main: Citing Art and Money, 7 Cuban Dancers Defect to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Citing Art and Money, 7 Cuban Dancers Defect to U.S.
